segments.text: I am glad to have the opportunity of visiting your corporation . I hope we can do business together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a great pleasure to meet you , Mr . White . I believe you have seen our exhibits in the showroom . What is it that particularly interests you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am interested in your hardware . I've seen the exhibits and studied your catalogues . I think some of the items will find a ready market in France . Here is a list of requirements .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your inquiry . Would you tell us what quantity you require so that we can work out the offer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will do that . Meanwhile , could you give me an indication of the price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here are our FOB price lists . All the prices in the lists are subject to our confirmation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about the commission ? From European suppliers , I usually get a 3 to 5 % commission for my imports . It's the general practice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a rule we don't allow any commission . But if the order is sizable one , we will consider it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You see I do business on a commission basis . A commission on your prices would make it easier for me to promote sales . Even 2 or 3 % would help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll discuss this when you place your order with us .
segments.speaker: S2
